answers.answer: It can be a symptom of pre eclampsia the protien is a big significance to this, the best thing u can do is to try and relax as much as u possibly can, the best thing is they are on top of it. I know it's gonna be hard to relax but please try, good luck. How far gone are u?xx
I'm 37 weeks and 2 days.... Also I've felt like there is something stuck in my chest! I'm have really bad chest pains all of a sudden..

Sorry to hear this i had blood presure to wile pregnant and they check my urine and all i was 2 days there and even if all came back fine exapt the blood presure they still induce me after 2 days but i was in week 37 so was all save to do it. If ur not very far in your pregnancy they will keep u in for supervision and probably give u treatmant. Good luck and keep us up date .
I will update tomorrow. Thanks guys

What was your blood pressure at? I'm i'n n out of hospital for the same thing i got admitted tho done 4 24 hour urine tests so annoying, i hate doing em at home cos i always nearly forget!Anyway hope u n ur baby r ok but if you have started with preeclampsia then maybe it's better your baby comes while it's still safe :)
Also, headaches, vision disturbance like seeing floating objects, swelling i'n the face hands etc, pain at the right side under the ribs, being sick, all signs you need to be looking out for

question: so had my normal doc visit today and my blood pressure was real high and so they waited 10 mins and checked it agaim and was even higher so. They sent me to labor&delivery and monitored me and I was have contractions alot they to my blood and the test came back fine! So now I'm on bed rest but they are making me do a 24hr urine testing that I have to bring back to them tomorrow to see if there is any protein in my urine. I was only a finger tip dialated the nurse said. What happens if there is protein in my urine will they make me have my baby tomorrow ! I'm getting kinda scared!! And have had really bad headaches and that's a symptom???
title: labor
